subject: Tennis
Monte Carlo Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic defeated Rafael Nadal in the final of the Monte Carlo Masters, ending Nadal’s streak of 8 straight titles and 46 consecutive victories at the event.
snippet: Novak Djokovic defeated Rafael Nadal in the final of the Monte Carlo Masters, ending Nadal’s streak of 8 straight titles and 46 consecutive victories at the event.
